Package cea.federated.client

Class OfflineClient

java.lang.Object
cea.federated.client.Client
cea.federated.client.OfflineClient
public class OfflineClient extends Client
Implementation of the offline client overlay. As it is offline, the process will be directly invoked without using the rest of STREAMER modules. This implementation compensates the missing elements of the rest of STREAMER modules that are necessary for the functioning of a client object.

  • Constructor Details

    • OfflineClient

      public OfflineClient(String id_problem) throws Exception
      Constructor of the object "offline client". It instantiates a client, reads the FL properties file, cleans the redis databases, and prepares the data in redis if the data_type=redis.
      Parameters:
      id_problem - Identifier of the problem.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error happens during the properties files reading or the use of RedisConnector.
